body: Please make this happen. Throwback only plays old maps like one fourth of the time. I want it 100% of the time because they are no doubt the best maps in my opinion.
body_tagged: Please make this happen. Throwback only plays old maps like one fourth of the time. I want it 100% of the time because they are no doubt the best maps in my opinion.
title: 24/7 OLD MAP PLAYLIST

replies.body: What you think is true is merely an opinion to others. There is no way their gonna make that happen from 1 player, sorry.

replies.body: I miss all the old maps too. But they newer older ones everyone likes better. Like clay wars. That map is just boring.

replies.body: Yeah sorry I edited it to say it's my opinion. Anyway, I know myself alone cannot change anything, but I was just hoping that more people would agree. And Clay Wars is one of my favorite maps, but I don't think it new maps like it should be in the "Throwback' playlist, which people would infer being only the old maps.
